entry.title: jens-maus/RaspberryMatic: :house: A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.

entry.title: lucky-yoolk/gradienteditor.js: GradientEditor.js is a lightweight JavaScript plugin designed to provide an intuitive UI for creating and managing CSS gradients. It supports multiple gradient color stops, directional adjustments, and pre-defined gradient templates.

entry.title: Cabraham1/custom-categorize: custom-categorize is a lightweight library designed to help you categorize data based on custom filtering logic. Built with flexibility in mind, the library offers: Default filtering: Use built-in logic for common grouping scenarios. Custom filtering: Pass your own filter function to tailor the categorization process to your data.
entry.content: custom-categorize is a lightweight library designed to help you categorize data based on custom filtering logic. Built with flexibility in mind, the library offers: Default filtering: Use built-in logic for common grouping scenarios. Custom filtering: Pass your own filter function to tailor the categorization process to your data.
